recipesJson.name: CCCP ☭
recipesJson.author: BCrunk
recipesJson.description:
A creamy coconut custard party.

Adapted from ChrisDvr1's "Cocconut marshmallow custard ceam".

reviews.text: This recipe is god damn awesome... Imo definitely better than chrisdvrs recipe you adapted it from.  His is very good as well but this is just better for me.  His is more custardy, this one is just fluffy delicious coconut.  Like coconut flavored marshmallows. ADV. FLV Marshmallow makes it. Recommended
